name: Dot Complex
description:
A game where you play as a bot that exists in cyberspace, searching for its creator

made for metroidvania month 13

tips: 

can skip hard stuff and come back later

use the slowmotion as much as you need to

controls (also explained in game):

A/D to move

Shift to view map

hold left click to aim (cant move while aiming), release to propel

Right click to swap positions with enemy that your currently hacking

R to restart room at any time

space/enter to progress dialogue
